snippet.title: SteamWorld Heist 2 - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Meet the crew, see turn-based combat featuring ricochet gameplay, and enjoy a delightful tune in this announcement trailer for SteamWorld Heist 2, an upcoming sequel to the strategy game SteamWorld Heist. SteamWorld Heist 2 will be available on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, Steam Deck, and PC via Steam on August 8, 2024.

In SteamWorld Heist II, set off on a humorous and thrilling adventure on the high-seas, taking charge as Captain Leeway alongside a ragtag crew of Steambots. You will explore vast horizons, above and below, as you set sail to solve the mystery of a deadly water crisis that’s causing metal limbs and mechanical hearts to corrode.
